segments.text: Well , I'm afraid we've had a slight delay .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's the problem ? We really can't have any delays at this stage . We're working to a really tight schedule and we're already over budget .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The cement arrived late but don't worry , I'm confident we can still meet the deadline . The crew is on stand-by and as soon as the concrete has set we can get started again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Keep me informed . Jt must be ready on time .
segments.speaker: S1
